member.summary: 管理人編號。null表示無管理者，通常是系統角色。

example.code: //透過Interface取得服務 var service = ServiceHelper.Create<ISecurityModifier>(); /* 註：此寫法 用Web呼叫時需於Web.Config加上 <system.serviceModel> <client> <endpoint address="http://localhost:XXXX/Microsoft.CUF.ISecurityModifier.svc" binding="basicHttpBinding" bindingConfiguration="BasicHttpBinding" contract="Microsoft.CUF.ISecurityModifier" name="Microsoft.CUF.ISecurityModifier" behaviorConfiguration="CommonEndpointBehavior" /> </client> </system.serviceModel> </configuration> 以「元件方式」呼叫時需於Web.Config加上 <configuration> <configSections> <section name="unity" type="Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.UnityConfigurationSection, Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration"/> </configSections> <unity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/practices/2010/unity"> <sectionExtension type="Microsoft.CUF.Framework.Service.UnityWcfConfigExtension, Microsoft.CUF.Framework" /> <container> <register type="Microsoft.CUF.ISecurityModifier,Microsoft.CUF.Security.Contract" mapTo="Microsoft.CUF.SecurityModifier,Microsoft.CUF.Security.Service"/> </container> </unity> </configuration> */
